data.author: Philip Guedalla
data.quote: Greatness is so often a courteous synonym for great success.

data.author: Matt Cameron
data.quote: No matter how much success you're having, you can't continue working together if you can't communicate.

data.author: Elbert Hubbard
data.quote: Pray that success will not come any faster than you are able to endure it.

data.author: Gabrielle Aplin
data.quote: I am never without my lyric book. If anything inspirational happens, I have it there so nothing's forgotten.

data.author: Harsha Bhogle
data.quote: In sports teams, apart from talk of sporting prowess and the imparting of inspirational thought, an extraordinary amount of time is spent discussing, and flaunting, material possessions.

data.author: Larry Ellison
data.quote: I have had all of the disadvantages required for success.

data.author: Helen Rowland
data.quote: You will never win if you never begin.

data.author: Jack Nicholson
data.quote: I sort of understood that when I first started: that you shouldn't repeat a success. Very often you're going to, and maybe the first time you do, it works. And you love it. But then you're trapped.

data.author: Azim Premji
data.quote: People are the key to success or extraordinary success.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.quote: There's no abiding success without commitment.

data.author: Dwayne Johnson
data.quote: Check your ego at the door. The ego can be the great success inhibitor. It can kill opportunities, and it can kill success.

data.author: Smokey Robinson
data.quote: In fact, I wouldn't really call this a Gospel album, I call it more an inspirational album.

data.author: George C. Marshall
data.quote: Don't fight the problem, decide it.

data.author: John W. Gardner
data.quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.

data.author: Ken Venturi
data.quote: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.

data.author: Woody Allen
data.quote: Seventy percent of success in life is showing up.

data.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
data.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.

data.author: Phillips Brooks
data.quote: The ideal life is in our blood and never will be still.

data.author: Colin Powell
data.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.

data.author: Jean Cocteau
data.quote: The reward of art is not fame or success but intoxication: that is why so many bad artists are unable to give it up.
